title: Chrissy Metz hits a fashion high note at CMT Artist Of The Year
text:
She plays aspiring singer Kate Pearson on her hit drama This is Us.

And Chrissy Metz showed what her voice can do while she performed at the CMT Artists of the Year.

But before she took the stage the 39-year-old hit the red carpet in a gorgeous nude gown and posed with one of her co-stars.

Fringey: before she took the stage Chrissy Metz hit the red carpet in a gorgeous nude gown and posed with one of her co-stars

Seemingly as an homage to country music fashion, she donned a pink wrap gown that was covered in fringe.

She wore gold dangle gold earrings but kept other accessories to a minimum.

For glam, the actress had a pink smokey eye and rosey lip and cheek color.

Co-stars: She took a minute to pose for photos with Lonnie Chavis, who stars as young Randall on the show

And her hair was down in a very straight and sleek look.

She took a minute to pose for photos with Lonnie Chavis, who stars as young Randall on the show.

The young actor wore sleek black slacks and a silver and black coat, with a metallic sheen.

Chrissy has been starring on This Is Us since its first season in 2016, amid a cast that includes Mandy Moore, Sterling K. Brown (adult Randall), Milo Ventimiglia and Justin Hartley.

Quick change: Once inside, Chrissy swapped for a dark wash, blue denim dress that fell at her knee and revealed her gold heels. She took the stage to perform a cover of Even Though I'm Going by Luke Comb's

Once inside, Chrissy swapped for a dark wash, blue denim dress that fell at her knee and revealed her gold heels.

She took the stage to perform a cover of Even Though I'm Going by Luke Comb's.

The dress had a sweetheart neckline and puffed 3/4 sleeves.

Her hair was swept up for the performance, a change from her earlier do.

Ladies who shine: She posed backstage with Canadian country singer Tenille Townes
